head.title: Equity Offerings Set for This Week

hedline.hl1: Equity Offerings Set for This Week

block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Avistar Communications Corp., Redwood Shores, Calif., an initial public offering of 3.6 million shares. Chase Bank Hambrecht & Quist.
Changepoint Corp., Richmond Hill, Ontario, an initial public offering of five million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Dyax Corp., Cambridge, Mass., an initial public offering of four million shares. J. P. Morgan Securities.
Integrated Telecom Express Inc., Santa Clara, Calif., an initial public offering of 5.6 million shares. Lehman Brothers.
Ista Pharmaceuticals Inc., Irvine, Calif., an initial public offering of 4.5 million shares. CIBC Wood Gundy.
Lexar Media Inc., Fremont, Calif., an initial public offering of 6.5 million shares. Chase Bank Hambrecht & Quist.
Liquor.com Inc., Chicago, Ill., an initial public offering of two million units. Each unit represents one share and one redeemable warrant. Dirks.
Micro Component Technology Inc., St. Paul, three million shares. Needham & Co.
O2Micro International Ltd., George Town, Grand Cayman, an initial public offering of four million ordinary shares. Robertson Stevens.
o2wireless Solutions Inc., Atlanta, Ga., an initial public offering of 6.1 million shares. Chase Bank Hambrecht & Quist.
PECO II Inc., Galion, Ohio, an initial public offering of 5 million shares. Robertson Stevens.
PeoplePC Inc., San Francisco, Calif., an initial public offering of 11.5 million shares. Chase Bank Hambrecht & Quist.
Spectrum Control Inc., Fairview, Penn., 2.1 million shares. Janney Montgomery Scott Inc.
Synquest Inc., Norcross, Ga., an initial public offering of five million shares. Bear, Stearns & Co.
Teledyne Technologies Inc., Los Angeles, Calif., 4.1 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Viasource Communications Inc., Fort Lauderdale, Fla., an initial public offering of 11 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
WJ Communications Inc., Palo Alto, Calif., an initial public offering of 5.4 million shares. Chase Bank Hambrecht & Quist.
